plot: The dreamlike story of a young disabled boy whose mother is trapped in an abusive relationship and the events leading up to a decision that changes his life forever.
title: Daniel, Wake Up
plot_es: The dreamlike story of a young disabled boy whose mother is trapped in an abusive relationship and the events leading up to a decision that changes his life forever.
plot_en: The dreamlike story of a young disabled boy whose mother is trapped in an abusive relationship and the events leading up to a decision that changes his life forever.
